00066 class VTK_vtkParticleSpringSystem_EXPORT vtkSpring : public vtkObject {
00067 public:
00068 
00070     vtkTypeRevisionMacro(vtkSpring, vtkObject);
00072     static vtkSpring * New();
00074     void PrintSelf(ostream& os, vtkIndent indent);
00075 
00077     vtkSetMacro(Id, vtkIdType);
00079     vtkGetMacro(Id, vtkIdType);
00081     vtkSetMacro(SpringCoefficient, double);
00083     vtkGetMacro(SpringCoefficient, double);
00085     vtkSetMacro(DampingCoefficient, double);
00087     vtkGetMacro(DampingCoefficient, double);
00089     vtkSetMacro(DistanceCoefficient, double);
00091     vtkGetMacro(DistanceCoefficient, double);
00093     vtkSetMacro(DeltaT, double);                    // dt for every step
00095     vtkGetMacro(DeltaT, double);
00097     vtkGetMacro(RestLength, double);                    // Distance between particles
00098 
00100     double * GetDirection();
00101 
00103     void GetDirection(double Direction[3]);
00104 
00106     void InsertNextParticle(vtkParticle * particle);
00107 
00109     void SetParticle(vtkIdType id, vtkParticle * particle);
00110 
00112     vtkParticle * GetParticle(vtkIdType id);
00113 
00115     bool ContainsParticle(vtkParticle * particle);
00116 
00118     void Init();
00119 
00120 protected:
00121     vtkSpring();
00122     ~vtkSpring();
00123 
00125     vtkIdType Id;
00127     double SpringCoefficient;
00129     double DampingCoefficient;
00131     double DistanceCoefficient;
00133     double DeltaT;
00134 
00136     double RestLength;
00138     double Direction[3];
00139 
00141     vtkParticleCollection * Particles;
00142 
00143 private:
